properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 2:43PM CST until February 12 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls SD
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills
expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Winter
Weather Advisory, blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 40
mph.

* WHERE...Beadle, Kingsbury and Brookings Counties.

* WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM this evening to
noon CST Thursday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM
CST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The
dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed
skin in as little as 10 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you
wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST THURSDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED
